itemDescription: English harpsichordist, organist, fortepianist and musicologist

wikipedia_page.main: Richard Lester (born 1945) is an English harpsichordist, organist, fortepianist and musicologist.

response: * Domenico Scarlatti: The Complete Sonatas, Richard Lester, harpsichord & fortepiano (2001–2005, 39 CDs in 7 volumes Nimbus Records NI 1725/NI 1741) .
Richard Lester is an American film director based in the United Kingdom.
Richard Lester may also refer to:
* Richard Lester (harpsichordist), English harpsichordist and musicologist
